title: The Days the world went mad
creator_credit: Max Morgan-Witts and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: A documentary of natural disasters compiled from film footage gathered from all over the world. Earthquakes, tidal waves, eruptions, tornadoes and hurricanes are all recorded. Includes unique footage of the Alaskan earthquake.
